name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and superior sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

comments.comment: Amazing sound quality! The noise cancellation works perfectly.
Great product, very comfortable for long listening sessions.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced smartwatch with health tracking, GPS, heart rate monitor, and 7-day battery life. Track your fitness goals and stay connected.

comments.comment: Love the health tracking features! Very accurate.

name: Premium Coffee Maker
description: Professional-grade coffee maker with built-in grinder, programmable timer, and thermal carafe. Brew the perfect cup every time.

name: Professional Running Shoes
description: High-performance running shoes with advanced cushioning, breathable material, and durable sole. Designed for serious runners.

name: LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness, color temperature control, and built-in USB charging ports for your devices.

name: Gaming Laptop Pro
description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX graphics, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and 144Hz display. Perfect for gaming and content creation.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with blue switches, programmable keys, and durable aluminum frame. Built for competitive gaming.

name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision sensor, long battery life, and comfortable grip. Perfect for office work and gaming.

name: 5G Smartphone
description: Latest 5G smartphone with triple camera system, all-day battery, and premium build quality. Capture life in stunning detail.

name: Adjustable Dumbbells Set
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells set with quick-change weight plates. Perfect for home gym and strength training workouts.

name: HEPA Air Purifier
description: Advanced HEPA air purifier with smart sensors, removes 99.97% of allergens and pollutants. Quiet operation for bedrooms and offices.

name: Professional Tennis Racket
description: High-quality tennis racket with carbon fiber frame, perfect balance, and professional string tension. Ideal for intermediate to advanced players.

name: Travel Backpack with USB Port
description: Water-resistant travel backpack with built-in USB charging port, anti-theft zippers, and laptop compartment. Perfect for business and travel.

name: Polarized Sports Sunglasses
description: Premium polarized sports sunglasses with UV400 protection, lightweight frame, and anti-slip coating. Perfect for outdoor activities.

name: 4K Gaming Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K gaming monitor with 144Hz refresh rate, HDR support, and ultra-low input lag. Perfect for competitive gaming and content creation.

name: Premium Yoga Mat
description: Extra-thick yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning. Made from eco-friendly materials, perfect for yoga, pilates, and meditation.

name: 10-inch Tablet Pro
description: High-performance tablet with stylus support, all-day battery, and stunning display. Perfect for creativity and productivity on the go.
